metadata.title: CVE-2019-8720 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
A vulnerability was found in WebKit. The flaw is triggered when processingmaliciously crafted web content that may lead to arbitrary code execution.Improved memory handling addresses the multiple memory corruption issues.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-8720` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.26.1-3
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.26.1-3
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.26.1-3
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.26.1-3
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.26.1-3
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.26.1-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.26.1-3').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
